topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Alpha: Creating and Deleting Users

body.p: As an admin, you can create and delete users.

section.title: Create a user
section.note: At least one project must exist before you can create users.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Identity dashboard, then the Users panel.
In the Users table, click Create User.

In the Create User screen, enter the following:
User Name - Enter a name for the user. The user will need this name to log in.
Email - Enter an email associated with this user.
Password - Enter a password for the user. The user will need the password to log in.
Confirm Password - Re-enter the password to confirm.
Primary Project - Select a primary project for the user. The primary project is simply the first project the user is associated with.
Role - Select a role for the user. The role determines many of the tasks that the user can perform.

Click Create User.
The user is created and appears in the user list.
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Identity dashboard, then the Users panel.
In the Users table, for the user you want to delete, click Edit User then Delete User.

In the confirmation dialog that appears, click Delete User.
The user is removed and no longer available in the domain.
